com.teamonehundred.pixelboat

Class PlayerBoat

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CollisionObject

    class PlayerBoat
extends Boat
    Represents the user player's boat.

      • PlayerBoat

        PlayerBoat(int x,
           int y)
        Construct a PlayerBoat object at point (x,y) with default size, texture and animation.
        Parameters:
        x - int coordinate for the bottom left point of the boat
        y - int coordinate for the bottom left point of the boat

      • PlayerBoat

        PlayerBoat(int x,
           int y,
           int w,
           int h,
           java.lang.String texture_path)
        Construct a PlayerBoat object with at point (x,y) with width and height and texture path with default stats (stamina usage, durability, etc).
        Parameters:
        x - int coordinate for the bottom left point of the boat
        y - int coordinate for the bottom left point of the boat
        w - int width of the new boat
        h - int height of the new boat
        texture_path - String relative path from the core/assets folder of the boats texture image

      • PlayerBoat

        PlayerBoat(int x,
           int y,
           int w,
           int h,
           java.lang.String texture_path,
           java.lang.String name,
           float durability_per_hit,
           float stamina_usage,
           float stamina_regen)
        Construct a PlayerBoat object with all parameters specified.
        Parameters:
        x - int coordinate for the bottom left point of the boat
        y - int coordinate for the bottom left point of the boat
        w - int width of the new boat
        h - int height of the new boat
        texture_path - String relative path from the core/assets folder of the boats texture image
        durability_per_hit - float percentage (0-1) of the max durability taken each hit
        name - String of the boat seen when the game ends
        stamina_regen - float percentage of stamina regenerated each frame (0-1)
        stamina_usage - float percentage of stamina used each frame when accelerating (0-1)

    • Method Detail

      • finalize

        protected void finalize()
        Destructor disposes of this texture once it is no longer referenced.
        Overrides:
        finalize in class GameObject

      • initialise

        public void initialise()
        Shared initialisation functionality among all constructors.

        Sets stamina bar and durability bar textures and sprites. Initialises the bars' size and position. Initialises camera position.

      • setSpec

        public void setSpec(int spec_id)
        Sets the spec type of boat.

        Can be in these states: - debug - default - fast low durability

        Parameters:
        spec_id - int for boat spec

      • updatePosition

        public void updatePosition()
        Updates the position based on the user's input.

        'W' key accelerates the boat. 'A' Turns the boat to the left 'D' Turns the boat to the right

        Updates the x and y position of the sprite with new x and y according to which input has been requested. The camera will follow the player's boat

        Overrides:
        updatePosition in class Boat

      • getUISprites

        public java.util.List<com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite> getUISprites()
        Returns the all sprites for PlayerBoat UI.

        This includes the stamina bar and durability bar.

        Returns:
        List of Sprites

      • getCamera

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.OrthographicCamera getCamera()
        Getter for PlayerBoat Camera.
        Returns:
        OrthographicCamera

      • resetCameraPos

        public void resetCameraPos()
        Resets PlayerBoat Camera position

      • updateUISprites

        private void updateUISprites()
        Update the position and size of the UI elements (e.g. stamina bar and durability bar) according to their values.

        The stamina decreases as player requests the boat to row and move. It increases when this is not the case. Durability decreases according to the collisions with other obstacles. Dynamically updates the size of the stamina bar and durability bar based on the PlayerBoat attributes as they change.
